merata pasal ragar pitiye pradhanathama tharagawaliyak wana ‘singar sewans’ pasal ragar tharagawaliya labana masa 3 saha 4 dedina rajakiya krida sankirnayedi pawathwe.pasal ragar pitiye wishishtathama ragar kandayam 30k ‘singar sewans’ ragar tharagamalawe palamu kotase tharagawaliyata sahabhagi wimata niyamithaya.jathika thalaye ragar kridakayan bihikerena pasal ragar tharaga waraye aakarshaniya tharagawaliyak lesa salakena me tharagamalawe dewani kotase tharagawaliya marthu 17 saha 18 dedina rathgamadi pawathwena bawa shri lanka pasal ragar sangamaye lekam susantha mendis mahatha ‘dinamina’ta prakasha kaleya.‘singar sewans’ dewani kotase tharagawaliyata pasal 24k tharaga wadimata niyamithaya.me tharagawaliyen anathuruwa singar lig ragar tharagamalawa arambaena bawath eya ape්ral masa 17 wanida sita juni masa 24 wanida dakwa pawathwena bawath pasal ragar sangamaye lekamwaraya wadiduratath sandahan kaleya.shri lanka pasal ragar sangamaya wisin sanwidhanaya karanu labana me tharagawaliye anugrahaka washayen singar shri lanka aayathanaya katayuthu karayi..
